complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Integrate Task Master Documentation with MkDocs System
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the documentation integration process into more specific steps, including content creation, navigation structure setup, and automated update implementation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: While important, this task is primarily focused on documentation and integration with an existing system, making it less complex than core development tasks.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Node.js/Express backend initialization into core setup, middleware configuration, environment setup, and testing framework implementation
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Medium complexity due to standard setup patterns but requires careful configuration and testing. Multiple dependencies and TypeScript integration increase complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide SSH connection management into connection pooling, security handling, retry logic, health monitoring, and credential management components
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to security requirements, connection management, and error handling needs. Critical system component requiring robust implementation.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down character configuration into schema definition, validation system, CRUD operations, and file management components
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity with structured data handling, validation requirements, and real-time file watching needs.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Separate log collection system into protocol handling, aggregation service, storage management, streaming implementation, search functionality, and RPi integration
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to distributed nature, real-time requirements, and need for robust error handling and performance optimization.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down hardware integration into GPIO management, I2C communication, servo control, sensor integration, error handling, and health monitoring systems
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Very high complexity due to hardware interactions, multiple protocols, and critical timing requirements.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide scene management into timeline system, action sequencing, trigger handling, persistence layer, and playback engine components
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to coordination requirements, timing precision needs, and integration with multiple subsystems.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down audio system into playback engine, TTS integration, caching system, queue management, and synchronization components
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Significant complexity due to real-time audio handling, external API integration, and synchronization requirements.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Separate web interface into core React setup, UI components, WebSocket integration, authentication system, and dashboard implementation
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Considerable complexity due to real-time updates, responsive design, and multiple interactive features.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down monitoring system into health checking, metrics collection, alert management, and dashboard update components
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Significant complexity due to real-time nature and comprehensive system coverage requirements.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide active mode into scheduling system, transition management, error recovery, and override handling components
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity with focus on coordination and reliability of automated operations.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down security implementation into authentication system, access control, API security, encryption handling, and audit logging
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to critical security requirements and comprehensive coverage needs.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Separate documentation system into MkDocs setup, API specification, and automated generation components
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Lower complexity with well-defined tools and standards to follow.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down backup system into backup service, verification system, rotation management, and recovery procedures
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity with focus on reliability and data integrity requirements.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide optimization into monitoring setup, caching implementation, query optimization, load balancing, and reporting systems
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Significant complexity due to system-wide scope and performance critical requirements.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down error handling into global handler implementation, recovery procedures, notification system, and diagnostic tools
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to comprehensive error coverage needs and critical recovery requirements.
